name: Víctor José Gallego Fontenla
about: My name is Víctor, I'm a PhD student at the _Centro Singular de Investigación de Tecnoloxías Intelixentes_ of the _Universidade de Santiago de Compostela_. I've recieved my *BSc degree in Computer Science* from the _Universidade de Santiago de Compostela_ in 2015, and my *MSc degree in Artificial Intelligence* in 2017 from the _Universidad Internacional Menendez Pelayo_. My research is focused on *process mining*, specifically on the  *detection of process changes* during their execution.
affiliation: Centro Singular de Investigación en Tecnoloxías da Información
